mapper.select: SELECT idprcar_code AS car_code , member_id AS pr_id , member2_id AS ad_id , idprcar_title AS car_title , idprcar_co AS car_co , idprcar_co_start AS car_co_start , idprcar_co_end AS car_co_end , idprcar_date AS date FROM profes_car
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM profes_car WHERE idprcar_code AS car_code=#{idprcarDel}
